Wisdom: اعْتَصِمْ فِي أَحْوَالِكَ كُلِّهَا بِاللَّهِ فَإِنَّكَ تَعْتَصِمُ مِنْهُ سُبْحَانَهُ بِمَانِعٍ عَزِيزٍ
enWisdom: Seek protection with Allah in all situations, for indeed you will be clinging to One, Glorified be He, who is a powerful protector
Whoever seeks protection from Allah, He saves him

Wisdom: مَنِ اعْتَصَمَ بِاللَّهِ لَمْ يَضُرَّهُ شَيْطَانٌ
enWisdom: One who seeks protection from Allah is not harmed by Satan
Whoever clings to Allah, his wish is fulfilled [and his goal is achieved]

Wisdom: مَنِ انْقَطَعَ إِلَى غَيْرِ اللَّهِ شَقِيَ وَتَعَنَّى
enWisdom: One who cuts himself off [from Allah and turns] towards other than Allah becomes wretched and faces hardship

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِالاعْتِصَامِ بِاللَّهِ فِي كُلِّ أُمُورِكَ فَإِنَّهَا عِصْمَةٌ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ
enWisdom: You must seek protection from Allah in all your affairs, for indeed this is a [means of] protection from everything
